title: Twitch's Ultimate
body: I think Twitch's ultimate should have a range indicator of some sort that shows how far he can shoot. Considering that his bolts shoot in a straight line and don't home in like normal autoattacks, it gets very disorientating to use his ult. Having the range indicator would make it much more simple to use. Possibly improving his game play.
